meta.title: Important Information I Arizona Connections Academy

meta.name: DESCRIPTION
meta.content: Check back here for current important information about Arizona Connections Academy online school.

a.title: For enrollment help, call us now at 1-800-221-2720

br.p: This website is not compatible with Internet Explorer 8 or below. Please upgrade to the latest version here. This link will open in a new window.

div.h1: Important Information About Arizona Connections Academy
div.p: Information regarding COVID-19 is changing rapidly. We are in touch with state education officials and will update this page with the most current information. Current families please be sure to check your WebMail for communications from the school leader.

ul.li: Arizona Connections Academy (ACA) is currently open and currently enrolled students are able to continue lessons.
All in-person events and field trips are canceled. We will make a decision about graduation in the near future.
AZM2 testing for the 19-20 school year has been canceled.

div.p: Additional information will be updated as it becomes available.
div.h2: A Note From the School Leader
div.blockquote:
At ACA our first priority is the safety and well-being of our families and our school staff.
Although Arizona brick and mortar schools are closed, the governor has determined that online schools should remain open.
ACA teachers and staff are all working from home and are available to provide you and your students with our help and support during this time. We are so thankful that our ACA students can continue to learn even through this difficult period of time. If your family is struggling to keep up with work, please contact your homeroom teacher or an administrator - we are here to help!
— Ms. Heather Noto, Principal
